testcase.name: Verify one user from the List the users - Get request
testcase.system-out: Given I have the base URL...................................................passed When I send the GET request for "/users"....................................passed Then I should receive the correct response code "200".......................passed And I should receive the correct response with one userName as "Antonette"..passed

testcase.name: Make a new Post - Post request
testcase.system-out: Given I have the base URL...................................................passed When I send the POST request for "/posts" with payload "PostRequest"........passed Then I should receive the correct response code "201".......................passed

testcase.name: Comment on a Post - Put Request
testcase.system-out: Given I have the base URL...................................................passed When I send the PUT request for "/posts/1" with payload "PutRequest"........passed Then I should receive the correct response code "200".......................passed
